pages.text: Only affect fire-type spells. Fire spells have 10% reduced cooldown, their level increases by 1, their effects are amplified an additional level, and their effects last 1.5 seconds longer. Affects:$(li)Path of the Equinox

pages.mod_text: Your scepter feels warm to the touch. Imbues onto the Blazing Scepter and persists through the Path of the Equinox
